item.title: 'Weird Al': Meeting MJ was surreal
item.description: "Weird Al" Yankovic talks about the first time he met Michael Jackson and reveals why Paul McCartney turned down a "Live and Let Die" parody "Chicken Pot Pie" on strict moral grounds. Watch Conan weeknights at 11 PM ET on TBS.
item.ExtractedText: 'Weird Al': Meeting Michael Jackson was surreal MUST WATCH 'Weird Al': Meeting Michael Jackson was surreal "Weird Al" Yankovic talks about the first time he met Michael Jackson and reveals why Paul McCartney turned down a "Live and Let Die" parody "Chicken Pot Pie" on strict moral grounds. Watch Conan weeknights at 11 PM ET on TBS.
